overview: When an old adversary threatens Rome, the city calls once more on her hero and defender: Coriolanus. But he has enemies at home too. Famine threatens the city, the citizensâ€™ hunger swells to an appetite for change, and on returning from the field Coriolanus must confront the march of realpolitik and the voice of an angry people.
tagline: Let me have war, say I: it exceeds peace as far as day does night.
title: National Theatre Live: Coriolanus
